feed.title: Fedistar Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.9.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update dependency node to v20.15.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1501
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to ^7.15.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1518
  • Update Rust crate serde_json to 1.0.120 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1519
  • Update pnpm/action-setup to v4 by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1525
  • Update tauri monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1521
  • Update Rust crate open to 5.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1522
  • Update dependency eslint to ^9.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1520
  • Fix receiving wrong timeline messages by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1524
  • Update dependency rsuite to v5.65.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1482
  • Update dependency typescript to ^5.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1516
  • Update dependency rsuite to v5.65.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1530
  • refs #1375 Set locale for emoji picker by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1526
  • refs #1182 Translate language settings by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1531
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1533
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1517

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/compare/v1.9.7...v1.9.8

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.9.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Rust crate serde to 1.0.204 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1534
  • Update dependency ts-jest to ^29.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1536
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to ^7.16.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1537
  • Don't open status detail when clicking status body by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1538
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1550
  • Light and dark themes were reversed by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1552
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1535
  • Fix emoji picker overflowing by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1553

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/compare/v1.9.8...v1.9.9

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.9.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update dependency node to v20.16.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1532
  • Update dependency sass to ^1.77.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1539
  • Update Rust crate open to 5.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1540
  • Update dependency eslint to ^9.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1545
  • Update dependency eslint-plugin-react to ^7.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1546
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to ^7.17.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1547
  • Update Rust crate scraper to 0.19.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1548
  • Update dependency dayjs to ^1.11.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1551
  • Update Rust crate tokio to 1.39.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1549
  • Update dependency jsdom to ^24.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1554
  • Update dependency ts-jest to ^29.2.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1541
  • Update dependency next to ^14.2.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1542
  • Update dependency react-virtuoso to v4.7.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1543
  • Update Rust crate sqlx to 0.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1558
  • Update dependency rsuite to v5.68.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1544
  • Revert "Don't open status detail when clicking status body" by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1560
  • Update dependency typescript to ^5.5.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1557
  • refs #1529 Add hashtag name on tag's detail by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1561
  • refs #1529 Disable tag follow button if you're not logged in by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1562
  • refs #1529 Add clear button for search keyword by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1563
  • refs #1529 Add loader when loading more search results by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1564
  • refs #1529 Clear search results when clear button is clicked by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1566
  • refs #1529 Add accordion for search results by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1565
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1567
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1568
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1555

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/compare/v1.9.9...v1.9.10

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.9.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1590
  • Update dependency rust to v1.81.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1559

  • Update dependency react-virtuoso to v4.10.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1573
  • Update dependency ts-jest to ^29.2.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1575
  • Update Rust crate scraper to 0.20.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1577
  • Update dependency react-icons to ^5.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1583
  • Update Rust crate tokio to 1.40.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1584
  • Update dependency @types/react to v18.3.5 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1587
  • Update dependency next to ^14.2.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1588
  • Update tauri monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1589
  • Allow to customize font family by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1602
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1581
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1603
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1604
  • Put error when failing to get font families by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/pull/1605

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/fedistar/compare/v1.9.10...v1.9.11

entry.title: New release for Fedistar: 1.9.12
